name: intrackt-extension
description: Tracks job application statuses directly from your inbox using React.

scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build popup/public/index.html background.js --dist-dir popup/dist --no-source-maps --public-url ./ && powershell -Command "Copy-Item manifest.json popup/dist/; if (Test-Path 'icons') { Copy-Item -Recurse icons popup/dist/ }"
scripts.package: npm run build && powershell -Command Compress-Archive -Path manifest.json,icons,popup/dist,background.js -DestinationPath intrackt-extension-v$env:EXT_VERSION.zip
